data.message: First up brilliant song. The best I could have done for my mom on Mother's day was Text her. And then tried to call. You have all the Money in the world Marshall. I would have gotten onto a plane to see her if I was you. Then again I would have bought them a retirement home in Johannesburg. The point is-don't just wish for things to get better. Try help your mom. The worse is living with regrets. I Coulda. Woulda. Shoulda. I wouldn't wish that on anyone.
